features.name: Mythic Ability
features.desc: At 1st rank and every odd mythic rank thereafter, select one new mythic ability.

features.name: Enforcing Gaze
features.desc:
At the 3rd rank, Aeon gains the ability to enforce rules on everything around them, giving various benefits to the allies and hindering the enemies. Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}. Base DC to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.

features.name: Enforcing Gaze
features.desc:
At the 3rd rank, Aeon gains the ability to enforce rules on everything around them, giving various benefits to the allies and hindering the enemies. Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}. Base DC to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.

features.name: Aeon Immunities
features.desc: At 3rd mythic rank, Aeon starts changing his own body and mind to remove impurities contained within. He gains immunity to poison, disease and confusion, and gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against chaotic enemies equal to his mythic rank.

features.name: Mythic Feat
features.desc:
Mythic characters gain mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} every even mythic rank. These feats can be selected only as part of mythic advancement, not as part of a character's normal advancement or in place of any other bonus feat.
Most mythic feats require a non-mythic feat as a prerequisite. These mythic feats enhance the benefits of their prerequisite feats, making them truly awe-inspiring. If a character doesn't possess any of the necessary prerequisite feats when she gains a mythic feat, she can wait to select a mythic feat until the next time she gains a mythic rank or level.

features.name: Aeon Bane
features.desc:
At 4th rank, Aeon gains an ability to make his weapons and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} especially deadly against his enemies. For a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to twice your mythic rank, you can make any weapon you wield count as having Bane quality, your spells gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your mythic rank to {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, and every hit you make with weapons or spells dispel effects from the target, as per the dispel magic spell.
Additionally, if you have inquisitor's bane ability, the number of rounds per day stack, and you gain the same bonuses while using inquisitor's bane ability.

features.name: Enforcing Gaze
features.desc:
At the 3rd rank, Aeon gains the ability to enforce rules on everything around them, giving various benefits to the allies and hindering the enemies. Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}. Base DC to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.

features.name: Aeon Immunities
features.desc: At 5th mythic rank, Aeon gains immunity to bleed, mind-affecting effects and {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}.

features.name: Mythic Suppression
features.desc:
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, Aeon can attempt to suppress the effects of mythic powers of his enemies. This ability affects only mythic demons, who can oppose the power with a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. Non-distorted mythic demons gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on this saving throw.
At 7th mythic rank, distorted mythic demons no longer get a saving throw to resist the effect, and non-distorted mythic demons don't get a bonus on the saving throw.
Starting at 9th mythic rank, mythic demons can't save against this ability.
Some mythic demons are immune to this ability.

features.name: Enforcing Gaze — Extra Gaze
features.desc:
Starting at 6th mythic rank, Aeon can simultaneously activate two gazes.
At 10th mythic rank, the number increases to three gazes.

features.name: Improved Aeon's Bane
features.desc: At 6th mythic rank, Aeon deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with his weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to attack and damage are increased by 1. His {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and attacks now affect the target with the effect of the Greater Dispel spell, and all his summoned creatures receive the benefits of Aeon's Bane.

features.name: Aeon Immunities
features.desc: At 7th mythic rank, Aeon becomes immune to curse and {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} effects, as well as energy drain.

features.name: Aeon Companion Immunities
features.desc: At 7th mythic rank, Aeons power is great enough to protect his allies from impurities. All his allies in 30 ft radius gain immunity to poison, disease and confusion.

features.name: Mythic Suppression
features.desc:
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, Aeon can attempt to suppress the effects of mythic powers of his enemies. This ability affects only mythic demons, who can oppose the power with a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. Non-distorted mythic demons gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on this saving throw.
At 7th mythic rank, distorted mythic demons no longer get a saving throw to resist the effect, and non-distorted mythic demons don't get a bonus on the saving throw.
Starting at 9th mythic rank, mythic demons can't save against this ability.
Some mythic demons are immune to this ability.

features.name: Enforcing Gaze — Perpetual
features.desc: At 8th mythic rank, Aeon's gaze can be used any number of times per day.

features.name: Enforcing Gaze
features.desc:
At the 3rd rank, Aeon gains the ability to enforce rules on everything around them, giving various benefits to the allies and hindering the enemies. Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}. Base DC to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.

features.name: Greater Aeon's Bane
features.desc: At 9th rank, Aeon's bane {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases by {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and damage rolls by 1. His first attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} automatically dispels an effect from the target. Additionally, his {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities can be used as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} instead of a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}.

features.name: Aeon's Companion Immunities
features.desc: At 9th mythic rank, all allies within a 30ft range of Aeon gain immunity to mind-affecting effects.

features.name: Mythic Suppression
features.desc:
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, Aeon can attempt to suppress the effects of mythic powers of his enemies. This ability affects only mythic demons, who can oppose the power with a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. Non-distorted mythic demons gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on this saving throw.
At 7th mythic rank, distorted mythic demons no longer get a saving throw to resist the effect, and non-distorted mythic demons don't get a bonus on the saving throw.
Starting at 9th mythic rank, mythic demons can't save against this ability.
Some mythic demons are immune to this ability.

features.name: Enforcing Gaze — Extra Gaze
features.desc:
Starting at 6th mythic rank, Aeon can simultaneously activate two gazes.
At 10th mythic rank, the number increases to three gazes.

features.name: Aeon's Immunities
features.desc: At 10th mythic rank, Aeon automatically {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} 20 on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} rolls, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} against chaotic creatures. Additionally, his {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistance{/g} and immunities of chaotic enemies.
